_comment: JSON Schema for tokens/tokens.json. Edit by Token Owner; update when token shape changes; approvals: Token Owner & Eng Lead.
title: Design System Tokens
description: Root object containing token categories. Each category can be an object of nested tokens or token groups.

tokenValue.description: Primitive token value (colors as strings, sizes as strings with units or numbers).

type.description: Semantic token type (color, spacing, font-size, duration, easing, etc.)
